dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What business do you have disturbing my domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come seeking passage through this realm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Passage is earned through strength. How do you plan to prove yourselves?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We will engage in combat to prove our worth.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, let the battle begin!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We are willing to negotiate and offer a tribute.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Tribute might please some, but strength is what I truly respect. Prepare for battle!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We mean no harm. We seek guidance to find the ancient ruins.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ancient ruins hold power that should not be trifled with. What compels you to seek them?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We seek knowledge and have no ill intentions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge may be sought, but at what cost? Leave these lands, or face the consequences!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We understand the risks and are prepared to face them.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravery will be your downfall. Prepare to be tested!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We come in peace and seek an alliance with your kind.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance? My kind does not suffer the presence of outsiders lightly. Why should I trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We offer our strength and loyalty in exchange for safe passage.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength and loyalty are of value, but trust is not easily gained. Prove your worth if you seek alliance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We understand your caution. We can prove our sincerity through a test of abilities.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A test, you say? Intriguing. Show me what you are capable of, and we may consider an alliance.
